Header: An interim report on death of elephants received
Content: Minister John Amaratunga says an extensive investigation will be conducted to inquire about the incident of the death of seven wild elephants. Addressing a media briefing held in Colombo, the Minister said that interim report of the investigation has already been received by him. Minister Amaratunga expressed his regret over the incident and stated that no such devastating incident pertaining to wild life in the country was reported previously. The Minister also said that only after the reception of the final report, cause of the incident can be declared.
